name: hdb-resale
description: My Web Visualization Project (rewritten in React)

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start-server
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server && npm run build-js
scripts.docker-build: npm run build-server && docker build -t yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest .
scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-test-A && npm run docker-test-B
scripts.docker-push: docker push yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest && iron register yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest
scripts.upload-worker: npm run upload-worker-A & npm run upload-worker-B
scripts.upload-worker-A: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL --name time_series yongjun21/hdb-resale node /worker/timeSeries.js
scripts.upload-worker-B: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL -e GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY=$GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY --name heatmap yongjun21/hdb-resale node /worker/heatmap.js

author: Yong Jun
